title: How to grow Giant Ceasar Lettuce

tasks.task: Participating in non-critical role in a video recording.
subtasks: Remaining seated or stationary during the recording.
Maintaining eye contact with the camera.
Announcing age of raisins (45) multiple times.
Expressing gratitude verbally after being acknowledged.

tasks.task: Operating a video camera or similar equipment.
subtasks: Framing the subject appropriately within the camera lens.
Communicating with the subject for instructions.
Ensuring the quality of the recording (e.g., lighting, sound).
Transporting the camera and accessories to the recording location.
Setting up the camera before recording begins.
Configuring the camera settings as needed.
Packing up equipment after the recording is complete.
